directions.text: This sauce may be tripled and frozen ahead of time for a large party.
Use with Vegan Nut Koftas for a completely Vegan, wheat-free meal.
Or cook  free-range Chicken pieces in it for a wheat-free and dairy-free dish.
In a large heavy sauce pan, heat the oil.
Add the Cloves, Cardamon, and Cinnamon.  Cook for 1/2 minute.
Add Onions, heat fully, and saute for 10 minutes.
Add Garlic and Ginger and saute for 3 minutes.
Add Coriander and Cumin and saute for 5 more minutes.
Add Turmeric and Powdered Chillies and saute for 1 more minute.
Add Tomatoes, heat fully and saute for 5 minutes.
Add Almonds, Salt, and Sugar.   Heat fully, Turn the heat to medium/low, cover.  Let it cook for 1/2 hour.
Add 1 C of water.   Process in the blender in batches until completely smooth.
Add the remaining water:   Use it to rinse the blender.
Adjust for salt and sugar if needed.

title: Vegan Tomato Nut Cream Sauce,  serves 8
